## Create class

```{r passenger}
#' superclass
setClass("Passenger", 
  representation(name = "character",
                 origin = "character",
                 destination = "character")
#' subclass inheriting properties of superclass
setClass("FreqFlyer",
  representation(contains = "Passenger"),
                 ffnumber = "numeric")

getClass("FreqFlyer")   
subClassNames("Passenger")
superClassNames("FreyFlyer")              
```
